said he sees no reason why the military should not be considered for spending cuts as lawmakers grapple with the ballooning deficit. Colin Powell pointed out that defense spending had at one time been cut 25 percent. I don't think the defense budget should be made sacrosanct, he said. The Obama administration has proposed cutting$ 78 billion from the military budget in the next five years. Allen Iverson had 26 points, nine assists, and combined with Linas Kleiza , JR Smith and Eduardo Najera on a 14-1 fourth-quarter spurt that carried the Nuggets to a 125-114 victory over the New Jersey Nets on Friday night. We've been struggling, losing two on the road and we just wanted to do anything to get a win, Allen Iverson said after scoring 21 second-half points to help the Nuggets break a two-game losing streak.
